alert.note: Alert for St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 18 at 2:54AM AKST until December 20 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation possible. Plan on difficult travel conditions. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches, with localized amounts up to 8 inches, and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch are possible. * WHERE...St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast. * WHEN...From late Saturday night through Sunday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds gusting as high as 50 mph will cause areas of blowing and drifting snow. Heaviest snow on the Bering Strait Coast. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Storm Watch means there is potential for significant snow, sleet or ice accumulations that may impact travel. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts.

area.areaDesc: St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast
